info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Geauga, northeastern Lake and Ashtabula Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ashtabula to Chardon. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Chardon, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Orwell, Huntsburg, Claridon, Austinburg, Montville, Kingsville, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Cherry Valley, North Perry and Thompson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
